name: diff-releases
description: Helm plugin to run helm diff-releases command.

scripts.pkg: npx tsc && npm run pkg-windows && npm run pkg-linux
scripts.postpkg: shx mkdir -p helm-diff-releases-windows-amd64/diff-releases && shx mkdir -p helm-diff-releases-linux-amd64/diff-releases && shx cp plugin.yaml LICENSE README.md helm-diff-releases-windows-amd64/diff-releases && shx cp plugin.yaml LICENSE README.md helm-diff-releases-linux-amd64/diff-releases

author: Sandip Chitale <sandipchitale@gmail.com>
keywords: diff WHAT [--code] --release1 RELEASE1 --revision1 R1 [--namespace1 NAMESPACE1] --release2 RELEASE2 --revision2 R2 [--namespace2 NAMESPACE2]
